item.title: whoami
item.description: Hey, This is Alka and I work as a Team Lead in Accenture India. My journey is quite straightforward. I did my Bachelors in Technology from Saroj Mohan Institute of Technology, West Bengal. My college was in a small town. So, along with my studies I got to know the importance of stoic lifestyle. I was then campus selected in IBM where I worked my next 4 years. This is where I learnt the basics of corporate world, EDI, EAI, project management in general.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a sea sponge who works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab: The Krusty Krabe is a fast food restaurant known for it’s signature burger: The Krabby Patty Try to make one yourself and you will be as happy as I am. My first Krabby Patty You can take a look at the recipe here .
